short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build lists of leads from LinkedIn quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
inBuilder is a one click solution to finding information for a given profile on LinkedIn. 

inBuilder allows a user to quickly build a list of individuals and to import them into your CRM platform. We focus on simplicity in both function and pricing. In less than 60 seconds you will be building lists of potential leads faster than ever. Our innovative solution focuses on automating in real time the tasks involved in finding a persons contact information. We look for both personal and company emails and phone numbers.

Contact support@inbuilder.net for any questions and ask for a live walk-though of the product.
